change_password_hint: For security reasons, your password may only be reset once / month!
reg_morethan: This field must be at least 6 characters long
reg_invalid_password: At least eight characters, containing one letter, one number and one special symbol
reg_password_not_same: Password and confirm password must be the same
reg_gateway_profile: Please select an SMB Gateway profile
reg_gateway_location: Please set a Gateway location on the map
input_serial_number: or enter the serial number manually
sure_switch_organization: Are you sure you want change Organizations?
gateway_profile_tip: An optional Gateway-profile may be assigned to a Gateway. This configuration is used to automatically re-configure the Gateway once the LoRa Gateway Bridge is configured so that it seamlessly manages the packet-forwarder configuration
network_server_tip: Select the Network-Server to which the Gateway will connect. If there are no network-servers available in the drop-down, please make sure a service-profile exists for this organization
reg_name: The Name may contain words, numbers and dashes only
discovery_enabled_tip: When enabled (and LPWAN Server is configured with the Gateway discover feature enabled), the Gateway will send out periodical pings to test its coverage against other Gateways in the same network
gateway_altitude_tip: When the Gateway has an on-board GPS, the value will be set automatically as soon as the network has received statistics from the Gateway
drag_marker_tip: Drag the marker to the location of the Gateway. If the Gateway has an on-board GPS, this value will be set automatically, as soon as the network receives statistics from the Gateway.
send_deposit_address: Only send MXC to this deposit address!
send_coin_tip: Sending any coin or token other than ETH to this address may result in the loss of your deposit
deposit_confirm_tip: Your MXC will be deposited after 12 network confirmations
staking_trade_tip: Staking enhances data trading, giving all holders a fair way to take part in the network
reg_amount: The amount must be more than 0
withdraw_submit_tip: Your withdrawal request was successfully submitted, the Supernode Operator will confirm this transaction within the next business day
staked_submit_tip: Your Staked request was successfully submitted
scan_code: Please position the QR Code in the highlighted box
send_email: Please confirm the verification code we sent to your email
agree_conditions: I agree to the MXC Terms & Conditions
send_marking_information: Send me important marketing information relating to MXC
qr_desc_01: Authenticator apps allow you to generate security codes on your mobile device.
qr_desc_03: 1. Open your authenticator app and add a new time-based token.
enter_security_01: Please, enter the security code generated by your authenticator app to verify that is configured correctly.
recovery_cd_desc_02: Write down these backup codes. These can be used if you lose your 2FA device.
recovery_cd_desc_04: I wrote them down and put them in a safe place.
wthdr_ent_code_02: Get a verification code from the Google
wthdr_ent_code_03: Authenticator app, or use one of your backup codes
24hours_warning: Each withdrawal is subject to a security screening that can take up to 24 hours on business days.
update_dialog_content: There is a new version available with the most advanced features, please click confirm to upgrade!
smart_bluetooth_connect: Please connect this device in Bluetooth settings
connected_device_success: You’ve successfully connected your Oracle timepiece. Now it’s time to get active, in order to thoroughly test your signal strength. Start making some footprints!
set_borders_desc: Your Gateway is where everything starts. Drag the pin to set a border around your Gateway and receive a notification if your device goes out of range.
oracle_desc: Oracle is an IoT Data sharing device. In order to earn MXC token you will need to fill your details below. If you do not wish to earn MXC token you can skip this step.
alert_setting_desc: You will be notified if the device goes out of your predefined data border.
set_border_step1: Tap a Gateway to set the border
set_border_step2: Drag the pin around the Gateway.
